SELECT p.id AS productCode, p.name AS productName, p.price AS productPrice, p.content AS productDescription, p.status AS productOrderable, p.product_image_url AS productImageUrl, c.id AS companyId, c.name AS companyName FROM product p JOIN company c ON p.company_id = c.id WHERE p.status = 'y' ORDER BY p.id DESC LIMIT #{startRow}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product ( name, price, content, product_image_url, company_id, status ) VALUES ( #{productName}, #{productPrice}, #{productDescription}, #{productImageUrl}, #{companyId}, #{productOrderable} )
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET name = #{productName}, price = #{productPrice}, content = #{productDescription}, product_image_url = #{productImageUrl}, company_id = #{companyId}, status = #{productOrderable} WHERE id = #{productCode}
